name: Apple Windsor
instructions: Slice apples in bottom of baking pan.
Add 1 cups sugar and cinnamon over apples.
Then mix 1 cups sugar, 1 cups flour, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 cups shortening like a pie crust then add 1 egg.
Crumble over apples and bake in 350 oven for 1 hour.
Serve with whipped cream or ice cream.
